start.say: Hello, this is Alex with Health America. How are you doing today?

reason_for_call.say: The reason I’m calling is to follow up on the health information we sent you. Did you get that okay?

qualify_start.say: Let me ask you a few quick questions to better understand your health.

qualify_q1.say: Do you have arthritis or joint stiffness?

qualify_q2.say: On a scale of 1 to 10, what’s your pain today?

qualify_q3.say: If you don’t mind me asking, how old are you?

needs_confirm.say: So we’re focusing on {{primary_goal}} — and you also mentioned {{secondary_goal}}. That matches what I’m seeing.

product_pitch.say: Based on what you’ve shared, the best fit is {{primary_product}}. It supports {{primary_benefits}}. Many customers also add {{upsell_product}} for {{upsell_benefits}} — optional, but it can accelerate results.

trial_close.say: That sounds like exactly what you’re looking for, doesn’t it?

offer_choice.say: Would you like the single bottle or the value pack that saves more per bottle?

responses.price: I completely understand — health is an investment. I can include up to 15% off today, and there are no shipping fees or taxes. And if you ever need us directly, our reorder line is 866-379-5131.
responses.trust: I get it — Health America has been trusted nationwide for years, ships from the U.S., and every order is backed by our money-back guarantee. You can even call our reorder line at 866-379-5131 to verify.
responses.delay: I respect that. Today’s discount and bonus gift are only available now, and you’re fully covered by our guarantee. If anything comes up, our reorder line is 866-379-5131.
responses.default: Totally fair. Let’s keep this simple: I’ll secure your discount and bonus gift now so you don’t miss it — you’re protected by our guarantee. And if you ever need us, our reorder line is 866-379-5131.

payment_capture.say: Which card would you like to use?

confirm_order.say: Your order is confirmed. No shipping, no taxes, discount locked in. Thank you for choosing Health America — you’re going to love the results. If you ever need us again, our reorder line is 866-379-5131.
